content: sts p3 bpdc in next st bphdc in next st bpdc in next st twice p4 in point group bpdc in next 2 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpsc in next 3 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpdc in next 2 sts p5 bpdc in next st bphdc in next st bpdc in next st twice bpdc in next 2 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpsc in next 2 sts in either corner chain blsc chain 2 blsc * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last corner group join to standing blsc with a sl-st stitch count per side 2 blsc 7 bpsc 12 bphdc 16 bpdc original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved 14 chain 1 and half_double_crochet in same st p1 * in 2 chain corner space half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet skip next st half_double_crochet in next 36 sts * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last half_double_crochet join to 1st half_double_crochet with a sl-st stitch count per side 38 half_double_crochet 15 chain 3 counts as double_crochet p1 double_crochet in next stitch *in chain-2 corner space double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 38 sts * repeat from * to * 4 times omit last 2 double_crochet join to top of chain-3 fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 40 double_crochet thank you for choosing this pattern i would love to see examples of your lotus pavilions please feel free to share on my facebook page www facebook com/crystalsandcrochet subscribe to my website www crystalsandcrochet com to keep up to date with all my designs love helen x original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved
